alert.note: Alert for Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 8:40PM CDT until May 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek at Avant affecting Osage County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek near Sperry affecting Osage and Tulsa Counties. Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. Caney River near Collinsville affecting Tulsa and Rogers Counties. Caney River near Ramona affecting Washington OK County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Caney River near Ramona. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, minor flooding occurs. Farmlands and rural roads are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 24.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 26.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
